alert.note: Alert for Hill (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 12:48PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Blaine and east central Hill Counties through 115 PM MDT... At 1248 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Beaver Creek to 7 miles northeast of Box Elder. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Havre, Chinook, Beaver Creek, Lohman, Zurich and Laredo. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 370 and 415. Highway 87 between mile markers 94 and 111. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for north central Montana.
